content.raw:
I reproduced the crash and got these warnings:

```
[Wrn] [ApplyWrenchVisual.cc:428] No torque visual
[Wrn] [ApplyWrenchVisual.cc:394] No force visual
[Wrn] [ApplyWrenchVisual.cc:428] No torque visual
[Wrn] [ApplyWrenchVisual.cc:394] No force visual
```

I don't get them every time I reproduce the crash, however.

I can reproduce it sometimes when I delete a model with both the rotate and force/torque axes showing. I still haven't figured out how to reproduce the bug where both axes appear, however.
